description:
Charming Midtown Unit

Ground level 1 bedroom + basement, two queen beds in the basement...

 Open bedroom has King bed 
Lower level- 2 single day beds, that each can be opened to Queen beds


No washer dryer in the building. Fluff and fold / dry cleaning available closeby.


Equipped with Wireless Internet and Time Warner / Spectrum TV.
name: Charming Midtown Unit
